text: - My name is Marcin Zasepa

and I'm Director of Software
Engineering at Real Estate SMG.

We are true Swiss champions in
real estate marketplace area,

with leading brands,
ImmoScout and Homegate.
With AWS, we are able to deliver
exciting new products for our customers,

which wouldn't be able
to deliver by our own.

It drives innovation and we
are able to move at speeds

which is expected from
the business we are in.
Swiss region is important for us.

Our customers value privacy
and want some of their data
to reside in Switzerland.

With the new region, we
will be able to expand
some of our use cases

and deliver even more
value for our customers.
With AWS, we feel to be in good hands.

The speed of development and
innovation they provide to us

help us to translate
their success into ours

and offers the innovative
products to our customers.
(upbeat music)
